text: Clarence Clifton Young (November 7, 1922 - April 3, 2016) was an American politician from the state of Nevada. He was a member of United States House of Representatives from January 3, 1953 to January 3, 1957. He was from the Republican Party. Young died in Reno, Nevada on April 3, 2016, aged 93.C. Clifton Young, former Nevada Supreme Court justice dies at 93 == References == Category:1922 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Lawyers from Nevada Category:United States representatives from Nevada Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Clarence Clifton Young
